name: @goodbricks/email-database-client
description: Database client for GoodBricks Email API DynamoDB tables

scripts.deploy: npm run build && npx cdk deploy --require-approval never --region us-west-1
scripts.synth: npm run build && npx cdk synth --region us-west-1
scripts.seed:dev: npm run build && AWS_REGION=us-west-1 node dist/seed.js

author: GoodBricks
